snippet: Construction of single-family jumped 12.8 percent last month to the highest rate since December 2007, before recession began.
abstract: Commerce Dept reports housing starts rose in July by 0.2 percent to seasonally adjusted annual rate of 1.21 million homes, fastest rate since late 2007.
lead_paragraph: Construction of single-family jumped 12.8 percent last month to the highest rate since December 2007, before recession began.

headline.main: Single-Family Homes Led Housing Starts Last Month
headline.print_headline: Single-Family Homes Led Housing Starts Last Month
